greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = phi(n - phi(n)), a(1) = 0.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: a(1) = 0, and for n > 1, a(n) = totient(cototient(n)) = A000010(A051953(n)). - _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 07 2017
results.author: J. Sandor (mstaicu(AT)dualnet.ro), Mar 09 2002
ext: Description clarified with a(1) = 0 explicitly set by convention - _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 07 2017
